ygData.subject: Re: Air and Ground
ygData.msgSnippet: Wildrider stands there for a minute, and laughs out loud, Yeah, nothing better than a big kaboom. Well, better get back and help Dead End he says to himself

Subject: Re: Air and Ground
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Wildrider stands there for a minute, and laughs out loud, "Yeah, nothing
better than a big kaboom. Well, better get back and help Dead End" he says
to himself outloud, as he transforms, and screeches off towards the rest of
the robots.
